description:
• Learn How To Build an Amazing Website with WordPress - 100% Beginner Friendly!
  • Simple & Quick Tutorial for Beginners & Intermediate Students

++++++++++++

Course Fully Up To Date With The Latest Version of WordPress

++++++++++++

Why Take This Course?

  • Learn Quickly & Easily How To Build a Professional Website in under 70 Minutes!
  • Your Website Will Be 100% Mobile Friendly (Responsive) and Display Perfectly on Any Screen Size.
  • I Show You How To Get Your First Month of Web Hosting for Only 1 Cent!
  • You Can Get Access To Our FREE Customizable Website Logos to Use On Your Own Sites!
  • We Create The Site Using the Same Technology as large Organizations and Celebrities including CNN, Forbes, Jay-Z and Katy Perry.
  • I Have A Wealth of Experience Building Professional WordPress Sites for Almost A Decade
  • 100% Newbie Friendly - You Don't Need Any Previous Experience or Knowledge To Take This Course!
  • You Won't Need To Write a Single Line of Code in This Course!
  • The Course is 100% FREE and Always Will Be!
  • I Always Respond To Any Follow Up Questions Related to the Course

Content and Overview

Suitable for complete beginners, this course has 18 lectures of content and will literally take you by the hand and show you step by step how to build a website with WordPress from start to finish!

Starting out with the installation of WordPress on the web server, this course will walk you through everything you need to do to create a stunning and compelling website in order to establish your online presence.

With the basics mastered through the process of learning by doing, by the end of the course students will have the knowledge to build a website on wordpress and update and edit it as needed.

You need no coding knowledge to take the course and do not need to write a single line of code to create your website, making this course perfect for complete beginners and those new to WordPress.
title: How To Build a Stunning Website with WordPress in 70 Minutes
